com.tectonica.jonix.codelist

Enum LanguageRoles

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<LanguageRoles>
      • com.tectonica.jonix.codelist.LanguageRoles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnixCodelist, Serializable, Comparable<LanguageRoles>

    public enum LanguageRoles
extends Enum<LanguageRoles>
implements OnixCodelist
    Enum that corresponds to ONIX Codelist 22

    Description: Language role code

    See Also:
    About ONIX Codelists, ONIX Codelist 22 in Reference Guide

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      Language_of_abstracts
      Where different from language of text: used mainly for serials
      Language_of_audio_track
      For example, on a DVD
      Language_of_subtitles
      For example, on a DVD
      Language_of_text 
      Original_language_in_a_multilingual_edition
      Where the text in the original language is part of a bilingual or multilingual edition
      Original_language_of_a_translated_text
      Where the text in the original language is NOT part of the current product
      Rights_excluded_language
      Language to which specified rights do not apply
      Rights_language
      Language to which specified rights apply
      Translated_language_in_a_multilingual_edition
      Where the text in a translated language is part of a bilingual or multilingual edition
